question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of Global Handwashing Day (GHD)?
option4: Clean hands - a recipe for health
explanation: The Global Handwashing Day (GHD) is observed every year on 15th of October to motivate and mobilize people around the world to improve their handwashing habits. It is a  global campaign to raise awareness of handwashing with soap as a key factor in disease prevention. The 2019 theme is ‘Clean Hands for All’.
